body:
Comment 11 by **momcconville**: 
That doesn't work, I've tried both go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc and go
get -u code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc. This was after doing a fresh source build
in case I had mistakenly deleted the directory at some point. Is there any other known
solution to this? Can this directory be easy downloaded from the CVS repo or anywhere
else?
